name: Greif, Inc.
description: Greif, Inc. is a global leader in industrial packaging products and services, dedicated to providing innovative solutions that meet the diverse needs of its customers. Founded in 1877 and headquartered in Delaware, Ohio, Greif operates in over 40 countries and serves a wide range of industries, including chemicals, food, beverage, and pharmaceuticals. The company specializes in the production of steel, plastic, and fiber drums, IBCs (Intermediate Bulk Containers), and other packaging products. Greif's commitment to sustainability is reflected in its efforts to develop eco-friendly packaging solutions and its focus on recycling and reusing materials. Through its extensive network of manufacturing facilities and distribution centers, Greif is able to deliver high-quality products and services efficiently to its global customer base. The company also emphasizes safety and operational excellence, with a goal of achieving zero workplace injuries and continually improving its processes. Greif’s mission is to enable its customers to succeed through innovative packaging solutions and exceptional service, positioning itself as a trusted partner in the industrial supply chain.

seo.meta_title: Greif, Inc. | Global Leader in Industrial Packaging Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Greif, Inc., a leader in industrial packaging products and services. Learn about Greif's innovative solutions, commitment to sustainability, and global reach.

faq.question: What does Greif specialize in?
faq.answer: Greif specializes in industrial packaging products, including drums and bulk containers.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Greif?
faq.answer: Ole Rosgaard is the CEO of Greif, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Greif headquartered?
faq.answer: Greif is headquartered in Delaware, Ohio, USA.

faq.question: What are Greif's main products?
faq.answer: Greif's main products include steel drums, plastic drums, fiber drums, and IBC containers.
